definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: Are the surface of the boards and holes completely dry after deburr process?

sentences.english: Furthermore, some methods to restrain or decrease the two-side direction burr in grinding-hardening machining are developed.
sentences.chinese: 同時，給出了若干抑制或減少兩側方向毛刺的方法。

sentences.english: Usage: Before loading seals or end hanging implement. Scraping and clearing burr and cement remaining.
sentences.chinese: 懸掛器，座封位置刮削清毛刺泥塊殘留。

sentences.english: Polishing and deburring using the side of the tool.
sentences.chinese: 使用油石側邊進行拋光或去毛刺。

sentences.english: I made sure that all the burrs were cleaned up so I didn't damage the plug.
sentences.chinese: 我相信所有的毛刺被清理，所以我並沒有損害堵塞。

sentences.english: Shell cracking is the source of veining defects.
sentences.chinese: 毛刺的出現與制殼過程中面層型殼的開裂有關。

sentences.english: Cutting edges must be free from burrs.
So there is rod configurational change in the deburring process.

sentences.english: Briefed in the article are the inner burr formation of and the burring method for the hi-frequency straight welded tube.
sentences.chinese: 簡要介紹了高頻直縫焊管內毛刺的形成和清除方法。

sentences.english: No follow-up is necessary since it does not make any return or secondary burr.
sentences.chinese: 由於不會產生二次毛刺，避免了重複工作。

sentences.english: Also check that the adjoining pipework is clean and free from debris and burrs.
sentences.chinese: 也檢查所連接的管道是否清潔，沒有碎片和毛刺。

sentences.english: Parts to be clean ad free of MFG oll, burrs, and sharp edges.
sentences.chinese: 工件應該保持清潔，沒有MFG油，毛刺，銳邊。

sentences.english: Polishing and deburring using the tip or side of a tool.
sentences.chinese: 油石頂端和側面均可用於拋光或去毛刺。

sentences.english: If there is slight wear and tear, can be rubbed off glitch Hone repair before use.

sentences.english: Roller antidandruff horizontal plane to ensure no chewing gum smooth burr.

sentences.english: When the burrs are small and uniform, they are effective for robotic deburring .
sentences.chinese: 當毛刺嗎小而均勻，他們是有效的機器嗎去毛刺。
